description: A generic device designed to close, or open, or both, one or more electric circuits.  All switches are two terminal devices including grounding switches.

contents.name: normalOpen
contents.description: The attribute is used in cases when no Measurement for the status value is present. If the Switch has a status measurement the Discrete.normalValue is expected to match with the Switch.normalOpen.

contents.name: open
contents.description: The attribute tells if the switch is considered open when used as input to topology processing.

contents.name: ratedCurrent
contents.description: The maximum continuous current carrying capacity in amps governed by the device material and construction.

contents.name: retained
contents.description: Branch is retained in a bus branch model.  The flow through retained switches will normally be calculated in power flow.
